channel.title: Post your injuries!
channel.description:
I broke my finger yesterday playing soccer as a goalie. Apparently the bone broke and twisted so they're going to have to surgically twist it back into place and keep it still with a titanium pin. Here's a picture:
![](upload://koZTpbxrScsCwgNx07KCeIINUI5.jpeg)
I've been told that after the surgery I can't so finger-related sports for about six months which sucks because my team had two tournaments planned abroad, one next Saturday and another in October.
So, basically what have you ever been hurt doing? Do you have a picture of it? Did it stop you from doing something?

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: blue
item.description:
Fruit:

I’ve been told that after the surgery I can’t so finger-related sports for about six months which sucks because my team had two tournaments planned abroad, one next Saturday and another in October.

I like how you worry about the tournament only ;D You do know you will never regain full movment in your finger ? ;f

Apollomasque:

where I got a big helping of emergency brain surgery… Doctor said it was a miracle I survived, nevertheless with no brain damage. Check my dev account for a picture.
https://apollomasque.deviantart.com/art/Stylish-Head-Wound-59515886
I win.

Im pretty sure, that you cant have a barin surgery with out any kind of brain demage ;f But ive seen a documentary about a guy with half of his brain working, and he seemed pretty normal, and had the same marks as other kids, so who knows, you win anyway ;D

I broke my nose 5x, my hand, displaced my jaw in diffrent fights ;d

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Pfff, not until you post that picture somewhere it doesn’t require me to make an account to view.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Apollomasque
item.description:
I was waterskiing and fell out of them when I hit an airpocket. I surfaced ahead of my skis and one hit me in the side of the head. I got a skull fracture and had to be air lifted to the hospital where I got a big helping of emergency brain surgery. I have a giant question mark scar on one side of my head which I now cover with my hair. Doctor said it was a miracle I survived, nevertheless with no brain damage. Check my dev account for a picture.
https://apollomasque.deviantart.com/art/Stylish-Head-Wound-59515886
I win.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
My hubby was climbing a ladder to take the shutters down off the house. He didnt place the ladder close enough to the house so when he got high enough, the ladder slid down the house and he landed holding the ladder. The violent landing on the ground broke off one of those little knobbies that are at the elbow bone, and then it whipped the knobbie around to the front in the crook of the elbow.

The doctor made a point to tell him that while this type of break is seen perhaps one time ever in a doctors whole career, my hubbies was the second in 2 weeks.

Surgery and cast came after.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Actually I once replaced my thumb because it was off the hole and I was doin’ okay after. Sure it hurts but not much. Same thing goes for a friend who felt on his wrist. Difference is he had to get a plaster or whatever it’s called.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

If there’s one thing Far Cry 2 has taught me, it’s that you can just snap that back in place and you’ll be right as rain.

Yup, and i have tried… Not smart, hurts like fuck…I was bored so i started skating barefoot and messed up, twisted my big toe(what i was refering to in previous sentences) and fractured my anckle.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Gluckspirat
item.description:
:fffuuu: what did he do?!

and is that thing on his knee the hole of the tube drainage? it hurts like hell when they pull them out…but it looks like your friend already had a lot of pain ^^

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
I kicked my smaller left toes really hard yesterday during a leap. I think there’s a hairline fracture in my second-to-smallest metatarsal, and another in one of my pinky phalanges. Within the half-second that I fell on the ground aware of what I’d done, I instinctively voiced Medic! in that whisper one gets when they’re trying to be loud without being loud enough to hear.

Speaking of foot injuries, I evidenced an injury a few months ago.
The effect of barnacles, salt-water, and one firm surface with which to crack a toenail.

Poor left foot. I suppose my right one learned its lesson early on.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
El_Chubba_Chubba:

Sorry but, any sentence that starts like that I ignore the rest of.

The idea was that it was not serious.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Well, at the moment, my hands are all cut up… I played drums for a couple hours and actually managed to get blisters on my hands from the sticks, then I moved a bunch of boxes and furniture out of my old place and broke them all open.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
I fractured my left wrist in two places playing hockey when a big senior defenseman checked into the boards and my left hand hit the boards and bent back really far. I also got a concussion from taking a slapshot to the head.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Tole
item.description:
When I was, 1 or 2 years old, I burned my face and both of my hands with a stove. Amazingly, i have no scars, except in my face, one of the sides of my face is slightly lighter, but anyone notes it, unless they stare at me for a long time

wheybags:

I once fell off a scooter…

Sorry but, any sentence that starts like that I ignore the rest of.
Kinda funny start though.

I once cut my foot on a boat propellor…it wasn’t on, but still sharp.

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
• I’ve broken my collar bone twice messing around with friends.
  • Sprained my wrist snowboarding (woo hoo…)
  • broken my foot while at diving practice (broke it on the board.)
  • BIG ONE, I fractured 7 vertebraes in the upper C section of my back, along with a concussion.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
I once fell off a scooter and got a cut that left a 1cm long scar on my hand.
That was the worst injury I ever suffered.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
My right arm was stabbed open during a football drill because some dude didn’t have his helmet on right (I think his chinstrap had something to do with it) and he was wicked short.

My left hand has various glass and pocket knife scars, but that’s about it. I’ve been hit by cars and I still haven’t broken anything.

I’m either ultra-cautious or I need to get out more.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injuries!
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Dude I broke my middle finger playing hockey. I put my hand in the air to call for the puck and this fat ass kid decided it was a good idea to do a slap shot at my hand, lucky day…it hit. My finger looked messed up, but i got no pictures.

I do got some pictures of a old foot injury, I landed on a beer bottle while trying to swing on a tire swing into a creek. Ill upload later its pretty gruesome and you can see bone and tendon ohhh.

Read full topic
